The_Seeds_Shell.display_help: The presence of the Bulwark Burr strengthens the protective shell around the Seed of Hamidon, maintaining it after the initial period of impenetrable defense has worn off.
The_Seeds_Shell.display_target_help: The presence of the Bulwark Burr strengthens the protective shell around the Seed of Hamidon, maintaining it after the initial period of impenetrable defense has worn off.

Decomposition.display_help: You have been targeted for a Decomposing Burst. The Bulwark Seedling will spray digestive acid at your location in six seconds. Gather allies near to yourself to help you survive the Decomposition!
Decomposition.display_target_help: You have been targeted for a Decomposing Burst. The Bulwark Seedling will spray digestive acid at your location in six seconds. Gather allies near to yourself to help you survive the Decomposition!
Decomposition.display_attacker_attack_floater: Stand together to absorb the Bulwark Seedling's Decomposition!

Spread_Infection.display_help: You have been infected with a strain of the Tellurian plague! You are taking extreme Toxic damage over time.
Spread_Infection.display_target_help: You have been infected with a strain of the Tellurian plague! You are taking extreme Toxic damage over time.

Hypnotic_Thorn_Tell.display_help: The Seedling is about to pulse with Toxic power! Recharge: Slow
Hypnotic_Thorn_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Contaminating Seedling is beginning to pulse a Hypnotic Thorn Blast!

Hypnotic_Thorn_Blast.display_help: The Hypnotic Thorn Blast is an extremely powerful psionic attack used by the Contaminating Seedlings. Move out of the way to avoid its effects!

The_Seeds_Might.display_help: The presence of the Bulwark Burr strengthens the protective shell around the Seed of Hamidon, maintaining it after the initial period of impenetrable defense has worn off.

Decomposing_Burst.display_help: You have erupted in a burst of toxic chemicals.
Decomposing_Burst.display_target_help: You have erupted in a burst of toxic chemicals.

Delayed_Flight.display_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.
Delayed_Flight.display_target_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.

Delayed_Guard.display_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.
Delayed_Guard.display_target_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.

Explosion.display_help: You have erupted in a burst of toxic chemicals.
Explosion.display_target_help: You have erupted in a burst of toxic chemicals.

Seedborne.display_help: The death of a burr has a negative effect on the Seed itself, causing it to take damage.
Seedborne.display_target_help: The death of a burr has a negative effect on the Seed itself, causing it to take damage.

Bullrush.display_help: The Seedling charges you and impales you with its thorny exoskeleton. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Bullrush.display_target_help: The Seedling charges you and impales you with its thorny exoskeleton. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Thorn_Blast.display_help: The Seedling can scatter a blast of Thorns in a narrow arc and impale a group of foes. Impaled foes may be knocked down.
Thorn_Blast.display_target_help: The Seedling can scatter a blast of Thorns in a narrow arc and impale a group of foes. Impaled foes may be knocked down.

Summon_Swarm.display_help: You have summoned a swarm to aid you.
Summon_Swarm.display_target_help: You have summoned a swarm to aid you.

Consumption_Tell.display_help: The Seedling is about to consume all nearby life! Recharge: Slow
Consumption_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Seedling is beginning to Consume all nearby life! Back away to survive!

Consumption.display_help: The Hematic Burr is able to consume the life force of nearby enemies, but moving out of its reach allows you to avoid its attack entirely.

The_Seeds_Protection.display_help: The presence of the Hematic Burr allows the Seed to drain the life essences of all nearby enemies, decreasing their defense and resistances and making them heal more slowly.

Seedblood.display_help: The death of a Hematic Seedling destroys the blood of the Seed itself, causing it to take significant damage.

Malignant_Infection.display_help: You have been infected with a strain of the Tellurian plague! You are taking extreme Toxic damage over time. Additionally, the plague will spread to any nearby allies, so be careful where you stand!
Malignant_Infection.display_target_help: You have been infected with a strain of the Tellurian plague! You are taking extreme Toxic damage over time. Additionally, the plague will spread to any nearby allies, so be careful where you stand!

The_Seeds_Vitality.display_help: The presence of the Maturing Burr allows the Seed of Hamidon to regenerate its internal components, causing it to heal significantly over time.
The_Seeds_Vitality.display_target_help: The presence of the Maturing Burr allows the Seed of Hamidon to regenerate its internal components, causing it to heal significantly over time.

Damage_Burr.display_help: The Seedlings of Hamidon are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
Damage_Burr.display_target_help: The Seedlings of Hamidon are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Damage_Seed.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon is naturally resistant to most types of damage.
Damage_Seed.display_target_help: The Seed of Hamidon is naturally resistant to most types of damage.

Toxic_Shock_Tell.display_help: The Seedling is about to pulse with Toxic power! Recharge: Slow
Toxic_Shock_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Seedling is beginning to pulse a Toxic Shock!

Toxic_Shock.display_help: The Toxic Shock is an extremely powerful toxic attack used by the Respiring Seedlings. Move out of the way to avoid its effects!

The_Seeds_Control.display_help: The presence of the Respiring Burr increases the density of the Spore Cloud around the Seed of Hamidon, making it difficult to hit.

Fly.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon soars high over the rubble of First Ward, casting its ominous shadow across the Sunken City.

Corrosive_Blast.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon blasts you with a digestive enzyme, striking you with great force and knocking you from the sky! This attack deals more damage for each Hematic Seedling that is alive.

Corrosive_Barrage.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon blasts you with a digestive enzyme, striking you with great force and knocking you from the sky! This attack deals more damage for each Hematic Seedling that is alive.

Tellurian_Outbreak.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon can create Seedlings out of concentrated Tellurian Plague and use them to defend itself from would-be attackers.

Seed_Dominion.display_help: For each living Bulwark Seedling, the Seed of Hamidon's defenses increase against all attacks.

Seed_Regrowth.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's Maturing Seedlings help their creator to rebuild its own organelles, allowing it to recover health at a rapid rate.

Enervating_Cloud.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Contaminating Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.

Confounding_Cloud.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Respiring Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.

Degenerating_Cloud.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Hematic Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.

Ectoplasmic_Slime.display_help: The death of the Seed has gone and made a mess...

Ectoplasmic_Diffusion.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon is leaking Ectoplasm!

No_Regeneration.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon relies entirely upon its Maturing Seedlings for regeneration.

Create_Seedling.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon periodically plants Seedlings to assist it in its assault on civilization.

Full_Defenses.display_help: The Seed of Hamidon is naturally resistant to most types of damage.

Fury_of_the_Swarm.display_help: When seriously threatened, you erupt in a storm of toxic chemicals in an effort to defeat your enemies.
Fury_of_the_Swarm.display_target_help: When seriously threatened, you erupt in a storm of toxic chemicals in an effort to defeat your enemies.

Plague_Outbreak.display_help: The Toxic Shock is an extremely powerful toxic attack used by the Respiring Seedlings. Move out of the way to avoid its effects!
Plague_Outbreak.display_target_help: The Toxic Shock is an extremely powerful toxic attack used by the Respiring Seedlings. Move out of the way to avoid its effects!

Antibodies.display_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.
Antibodies.display_target_help: Your acquisition of the ability to fly is delayed.
